Pre-school dinosaur history series. Andy goes on prehistoric adventures.
Andy travels back 145 million years to the time of allosaurus - a meat-eating dinosaur.

Young spinosaurus finds out what it takes to be a mighty super predator.
Andy, Jen and Scout travel the world in their eco-friendly, hi-tech explorer.
